get.summary: Applies the specified MxL method without a context
get.description: Applies the specified MxL method without a context

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The MxL method you want to apply. For a GET request, the only viable option is 'autoComplete'

post.summary: Applies the specified MxL method without a context
post.description: Applies the specified MxL method without a context

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The MxL method you want to apply. For a POST request, the only viable options are 'query' and 'validate'

parameters.name: mxlBody
parameters.description: The standard body for MxL requests is a JSON object which can contain the attributes 'expression', 'parameterDefinitions', and 'expressionType'
